sources.description:
Very Frightening Tales | Full Movie | Horror Anthology Movie | Short Horror Stories

A gripping anthology series featuring seven chilling tales: a young ballerina whose passion leads her to a haunting crossroads, a seasoned hitman facing retirement and his last job, a sinister package that brings unforeseen terror, immigrants daring to escape towards a fragile hope, a nightmare that morphs into a deadly reality, a fortune teller unveiling secrets best left untouched, and an ambitious actor willing to commit murder to land a role in a horror film.

2023. Stars: Michael ParÃ©, Christopher Dukes, Christopher M. Dukes, Madison Ekstrand
